basics.name: Benjamin Hawley
basics.label: Writer
basics.summary: A passionate writer with a strong desire to learn and grow in the field. Received a B.S. in Economics from NC State University in 2021. Offering three yearâ€™s professional experience in client facing roles in the power industry with an additional two years of content delivery and freelance writing experience. Currently in the process of transitioning to a more ideal industry.

publications.name: The Book of Choices Vol. 1: Death's Dilemma
publications.summary: An anthology of fantatstic stories from various authors selected from the 2024 Book of Choices competition.

publications.name: Stories That Need to be Told 2023: Mayflies
